full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/22/2023 Present to Inmigration Official when Interviewed Xua't trinh cho nhan-vien so Di Tru khi dudc phong van This form is to be answered by head of household and other members over 14 years and Phieu nay do chú gia dinh va nhung nguoi trong gia dinh tren 14 tuoi trà loi va chi7 include only those relatives traveling with him.
